author: bsunanda
body:
#### PR description:

Fix 2006 test beam configuration in view of recent changes in accessing the geometry parameters

#### PR validation:

Tested with many cfg files in the area SimG4CMS/HcalTestBeam/test/python. The changes are supposed not to affect standard workflows

#### if this PR is a backport please specify the original PR:

Nothing special
title: Run3-TB46 Fix the test beam runs in view of present changes
